text: M. K. Arjunan () (fondly called as Arjunan Master) (1 March 1936 â€“ 6 April 2020) was an Indian Malayalam music composer. He was known for composing many melodies for Malayalam cinema. He was born in Kerala, India. Arjunan made around 800 songs for 300 plays. Arjunan died on 6 April 2020 at his home in Kochi, India at the age of 84.Veteran Malayalam music director MK Arjunan Master passes away ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Indian composers Category:Malayali people
title: M. K. Arjunan
